description: This test assesses the understanding and recognition of the /b/ sound in various contexts, including sound identification, blending, and rhyming.

questions.prompt: Which letter makes the /b/ sound as in 'ball'?
hints: This letter makes a sound with your lips pressed together.

feedback.correct: Great job! The letter 'b' makes the /b/ sound.
feedback.incorrect: The letter 'b' makes the /b/ sound. Listen again and try once more.

questions.prompt: Blend the sounds to form a word: /b/ + /a/ + /t/
hints: Think of a word that rhymes with 'cat'.

feedback.incorrect: Try blending the sounds again. The correct answer is 'bat'.

hints: These words have the same ending sound as 'ball'.

feedback.correct: Excellent! All these words rhyme with 'ball'.
feedback.incorrect: Remember, rhyming words have the same ending sound. Try again!

questions.prompt: Which of these words starts with the /b/ sound?
hints: Listen for the /b/ sound at the beginning of the word.

feedback.correct: Great job! 'Bat' starts with the /b/ sound.
feedback.incorrect: Remember, alliteration means the same starting sound. Try again!

questions.prompt: In which position does the /b/ sound appear in the word 'box'?
hints: The /b/ sound is at the start of the word.

feedback.correct: Correct! The /b/ sound is at the beginning of 'box'.
feedback.incorrect: The /b/ sound is at the beginning of 'box'. Listen again and try once more.

questions.prompt: Which letter(s) make the /b/ sound in bullon?
hints: The /b/ sound is at the start of the word.

feedback.correct: Correct! The letter 'b' makes the /b/ sound in 'bullon'.
feedback.incorrect: The letter 'b' makes the /b/ sound in 'bullon'. Listen again and try once more.

questions.prompt: How do you spell the word that starts with the /b/ sound and rhymes with 'cat'?
hints: Think of a word that starts with the /b/ sound.

feedback.correct: Well done! The word is spelled 'bat'.
feedback.incorrect: Try spelling the word again. The correct answer is 'bat'.

questions.prompt: Spell the word that means: 'This is a round object that you can throw or kick.'
hints: Think of a word that starts with the /b/ sound and is round.

feedback.correct: Great job! The word is spelled 'ball'.
feedback.incorrect: Try spelling the word again. The correct answer is 'ball'.
